name: Yogi Ramesh
title: Senior Yoga Trainer
bio: With over a decade of teaching experience in Rishikesh and overseas, Yogi Ramesh specializes in therapeutic Hatha styles for all ages. His calm demeanor and deep understanding of yogic philosophy make his classes a transformative experience.

name: Priya Sharma
title: Vinyasa & Ashtanga Expert
bio: Priya's classes are known for their dynamic energy and creative sequencing. A certified Ashtanga instructor, she helps students build strength, flexibility, and focus, while encouraging a playful approach to the practice.

name: Anand Verma
title: Meditation & Mindfulness Coach
bio: Anand is a master of the subtle arts of yoga. He guides students into deep states of relaxation and self-awareness through Yoga Nidra and mindfulness practices. His sessions are a perfect antidote to modern-day stress.
